subject: Re: [cc-community] CC BY SA music on TempoStand
body:
Am Mittwoch 30 Mai 2007 00:10 schrieb Ujjwal Grover:
> We have recently launched our online music portal called
> TempoStand.
> It is a platform for promoting independent artists in India. All the
> music parked on TempoStand is Creative Commons BY-SA license. People
> are free to stream music online. They can also download music or buy
> a CD by paying for it and mix it and then share it.

Hi Ujjwal,

thanks for your information, great project, indeed ;)
We should try to start a database for CC-related projects like this.

Regards
Ralf
_______________________________________________
